text: is a Japanese judoka, Olympic medalist and world champion. He is from Kōriyama, Fukushima. After graduation from Nihon University, He belonged to Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. He received a bronze medal in the heavyweight class at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal."1976 Summer Olympics - Montreal, Canada - Judo" (Retrieved on 30 November 2008) He is world champion from 1975 and from 1979. As of 2008, He coaches judo at North Asia University in Akita, Japan. He is also one of the 'Frontier Ambassadors' of his hometown Koriyama City. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Japan Category:Judoka at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Japan Category:Nihon University alumni Category:Olympic medalists in judo Category:People from Kōriyama Category:Medalists at the 1976 Summer Olympics
title: Sumio Endo
